Welcome!!
You will love Shorty’s Place, a casual and friendly bar in Punta Gorda, Florida.  A place where you will have a good time!!

WHAT THEY SAY
Love this place….Dogs are alLowed! They do not serve food but they do have good drinks and they know how to rock! The owner is a nice lady and she does make you feel very welcome. Great mixture of people in this place! Always fun! Again, another review I should have written a long time ago. Been there several times and it really was a blast!
G. Whimpey
This pub has 24 beers on tap with some very good IPA and stouts. They have microbrews from some of the best breweries in the country. Fun outdoor seating with fire pit. We had no food and they offer only snacks but it is worth a visit just for GREAT beer. Had a good time everyone friendly we are from North Carolina have to get used to smoking in the public places tho. The DJ for karokee did a good job we will be back we are moving to Florida will be in North fort Myers but it will be worth the drive
T. Doxen
Fun to be had when the karaoke machine is out and the beer is flowing. Doesn’t matter how good or bad the singer is they always get a round of applause. Come grab the mike or just relax and listen.  You are going to love it!
L. Lewis
Shorty’s place is a great enjoyable place……….staff is great!!!! They have movie night!!!!!! Cheryl the owner is very helpful and nice. We had a pub crawl there and she was very accomodating. Thank you.
B. Hayes
LOCATION
(941) 639-BEER (2337)
306 W Marion Ave. Punta Gorda, FL 33950
